value:
It's easy to overlook what you can't
see, but the wind is how seeds get
scattered. We couldn't live without it.

I'm well acquainted with the wind.
I negotiate with it every time I ride
a wyvern or shoot a bow.

So this is the garb of the Wind Tribe,
huh? They know how to read the
breeze, I'll give them that.

If we're calling it a wind festival, then
I expect it to be a wild party, full of
freedom. No stuffy rules allowed!

The wind in Askr is no different from
the wind in Fódlan. They're both
invigorating, full of life and love.

I'm Claude of House Riegan. If you
want to enjoy the wind festival, try
$Nf's castle.
Nothing like the wind at your back.

You think I'm slippery? Try and catch
the wind.

Ugh—don't stand downwind of this.
It stinks.

Whenever the wind is behind you,
you've got to take advantage.

A festival of wind, eh? Well, you've
piqued my interest. Count me in.

You can't see, smell, or taste the
wind. The only way to sense it at all
is through touch.$k$pFortunately, touch is all you need to
make the wind your ally—if you know
how to listen to what it's telling you.$k$pWhich way's it blowing? How strong?
Is it soft and steady, or is it coming
at you in big, wild gusts?$k$pIf you can read the wind, you can live
by it. And it's far more reliable than
leaving your fate up to chance.$k$pI don't have to tell you that, though.
You're as good at reading the wind
as I am, $Nu.$k$pFor my part, I need to study up. I've
got a few ideas about how to make
the wind a bigger part of my life...
This'll blow you away.
Better move...
Riding high.
Scatter in the breeze!
Dust in the wind.
This tribe can control the wind, huh? Fascinating. What kind of magic is that?
*laugh* A textbook move like that won't catch me by surprise.
So this is basically just a feast, right? Count me in.
I feel a bit strange wearing this outfit...in other words, pretty much normal.
Nobles and commoners from all manner of worlds and cultures live as equals here. I love it.
We all need a breather now and then—especially when things are tense.
You know, you've got a calming air about you. I appreciate that.
You ready?
We've got options...
Let's take flight!
